      • peddllapp_sredmask

        public int peddllapp_sredmask(int aIsAddorRemove,
                              int aKeyIdx,
                              byte[] aMaskData)
        Save the SRED mask data.
        Parameters:
        aIsAddorRemove - 1: Add mask, others: remove
        aKeyIdx - sred key index
        aMaskData - sred mask data in byte array
        Returns:
        ACTIVITY_RESULT_OK, ACTIVITY_RESULT_BUSY, ACTIVITY_RESULT_PARAM_ERR, ACTIVITY_RESULT_KEY_NOT_INJECTED, ACTIVITY_RESULT_INVALID_KVC ACTIVITY_RESULT_SERVICE_AIDL_UNKNOWN, ACTIVITY_RESULT_SERVICE_AIDL_BINDING, ACTIVITY_RESULT_SERVICE_AIDL_UNBOUND
